channel.title: I want to make a simple action/template for iOS Calendar
channel.description:
Hi.
I would like to use Drafts to make quick events on calendar but I haven’t found a good action that covers all the things.
How could I make a simply structured Draft to use as a template (always the same except por time, date and start location).
Thanks.
